patthana18.8:1.1: Hetuṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.8:2.1: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.8:3.1: Hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.8:4.1: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.8:5.1: Hetuṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana18.8:6.1: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana18.8:7.1: Hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana18.8:8.1: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
